name: Browser snapshot
description: Capture a snapshot of a website with playwright and headless chromium. Needs a 64-bit system.

fields.name: persistSession
fields.label: Persist browser session between renders
fields.hint: When enabled, cookies/session storage persist between captures. Disable to use a fresh incognito-like session for each render.

fields.name: disableLowMemoryCheck
fields.label: Disable low memory check
fields.hint: Always install and run Chromium, even if we have less than 1GB of RAM. Disable this at your own risk!
